snippet: A new law in England and Wales is seen as part of the government’s effort to fight religious extremism.
abstract: England and Wales make it criminal offense to force anyone into marriage, effort to persuade victims to come forward and to emphasize secular legal values.
lead_paragraph: A new law in England and Wales is seen as part of the government’s effort to fight religious extremism.

headline.main: Marriage by Force Is Addressed in Britain
headline.print_headline: Law in Britain Makes Forcing Anyone to Wed a Criminal Act
